mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM goods_type AS T1 INNER JOIN supplier AS T2 ON T1.company_id = T2.company_id INNER JOIN manufacturer AS T3 ON T1.company_id = T3.company_id INNER JOIN company AS T4 ON T1.company_id = T4.company_id INNER JOIN city AS T5 WHERE T1.goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId} AND T2.supplier_id = #{supplierId} AND T3.manufacturer_id = #{manufacturerId} AND T4.company_id = #{companyId} AND T5.city_id = #{placeOfProduction}
